MWC.GUI

Interface CanvasType.PaintListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AWTChart, CanvasType.PaintAdaptor, PlainChart, RelativePainter, SnailPainter, SwingChart, TotePainter
    Enclosing interface:
    CanvasType

    public static interface CanvasType.PaintListener
    // support for adding a list of painters to this class

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      WorldArea getDataArea()
      give me the data area you require
      java.lang.String getName()
      what is the name of the type of data you plot?
      void paintMe(CanvasType dest)
      repaint yourself to this canvas (me)
      void resizedEvent(PlainProjection theProj, java.awt.Dimension newScreenArea)
      inform listeners that we have resized.

    • Method Detail

      • paintMe

        void paintMe(CanvasType dest)
        repaint yourself to this canvas (me)

      • getDataArea

        WorldArea getDataArea()
        give me the data area you require

      • resizedEvent

        void resizedEvent(PlainProjection theProj,
                  java.awt.Dimension newScreenArea)
        inform listeners that we have resized. this is especially useful for painters which plot static data such as a coastline or grid - it triggers a redraw from them

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        what is the name of the type of data you plot?
